document_title: Right testicular pain: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
Men should immediately contact their doctor if the following signs appear: (4)
Self-discovered abnormal mass in the scrotum; The scrotum turns red and feels tight and warm to the touch; Contact with someone who has mumps.
Additionally, below are some very serious symptoms that require emergency medical attention:
Sudden pain in the scrotum, becoming increasingly severe, with no signs of improvement; Nausea or vomiting; Pain appears due to injury.
subsection_title: dau tinh hoan ben phai.json. When to see a doctor?
subsection_data:
